customer_addr:
11776 S Daniel Street
Terre Haute, IN 47802

citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:35am-11:05am
on 04/24/2025. The inspector attempted to contact the facility by knocking on the door at the address provided for the site
of this account, honking the car horn, calling the phone number provided in the account, and sending a text message to
the registrant’s phone number. The registrant responded via text message that no facility representative could be
available for the inspection.
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:35am-11:05am 
on 04/24/2025. The inspector attempted to contact the facility by knocking on the door at the address provided for the site 
of this account, honking the car horn, calling the phone number provided in the account, and sending a text message to 
the registrant’s phone number. The registrant responded via text message that no facility representative could be 
available for the inspection.  
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and 
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
